snippet: West 53rd Street needs the character of the former home of the American Folk Art Museum, a building threatened by a Museum of Modern Art expansion plan.
abstract: Michael Kimmelman welcomes news that public backlash against Museum of Modern Art, which was planning to demolish the nearby former American Folk Art Museum, has led museum to step back from plan; asserts that West 53rd street needs character of the tiny silver building, which is considered a distinctive work of contemporary design.
lead_paragraph: West 53rd Street needs the character of the former home of the American Folk Art Museum, a building threatened by a Museum of Modern Art expansion plan.

headline.print_headline: Defending a Scrap of Soul Against MoMA
headline.seo: Defending the Former American Folk Art Museum Building
headline.main: Defending a Scrap of Soul Against MoMA
